mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, product_id, customer_id, cart_count, create_dt, creator, cart_price) VALUES(cart_seq.nextval, #{productId}, #{customerId}, #{productCnt}, sysdate, #{customerId}, #{totalPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS "cartId", c.product_id AS "productId", c.cart_count AS "cartCount", c.checked AS "checked", p.product_nm AS "productNm", REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(p.product_price)), '(\d{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS "productPrice", REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(c.cart_price)), '(\d{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS "cartPrice", p.product_stock AS "productStock", p.product_option_first AS "productOptionFirst", p.product_option_second AS "productOptionSecond", p.product_option_third AS "productOptionThird", p.product_image_first AS "productImageFirst", p.category_id AS "categoryId", a.category_pr_id AS "categoryPrId", p.status AS "productStatus" FROM cart c, product p, category a WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId} AND c.product_id = p.product_id AND a.category_id = p.category_id AND c.status = 'Y' ORDER BY c.cart_id
SELECT count(*) FROM cart WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND status = 'Y'
